sentences.en: As the egg inside the follicle develops, the follicle increases in size.

sentences.en: Objective To study the follicle mite infection in young students of Shanxi.
sentences.cn: 目的了解山西青年学生蠕形螨的感染情况,研究蠕形螨及蠕形螨病的特性.

sentences.en: Ovulation releases an egg from an ovarian follicle.
sentences.cn: 图示排卵,受精及受精卵的发育,输送和着床.

sentences.en: Prior to ovulation , the follicle is thin - walled filled with fluid.
sentences.cn: 排卵前的卵泡是薄壁的水泡.

sentences.en: Sebaceous glands are special glands attached to the hair follicle.
sentences.cn: 皮脂腺的特殊腺体是毛囊.

sentences.en: The whelk is the skin common one kind of hair - follicle sebaceous glands'chronic inflammation skin question.

sentences.en: Together , the hair follicle and sebaceous gland are often referred to as the pilosebaceous follicle.
sentences.cn: 毛囊和皮脂腺通常称为皮脂腺毛囊.

sentences.en: Ultrasound may also help to document follicle's collapse, implying release of egg.
sentences.cn: 超检查有助于证实卵泡塌陷, 暗示排出卵子.
